entry.def: Some-one's bottom can be referred to as their posterior .
Posterior describes something that is situated at the back of something else.

auth_sentence.content: Scientists get up off your posteriors and start work!

auth_sentence.content: Neither he, nor his posteriors from generation to generation, shall sit upon it ony mair.

auth_sentence.content: City superviser Scott Wiener wants nudists to cover the seats of public benches or seats before parking their bare posteriors.
